name: piglet
tagline: A self-hosted flashcard and quiz platform
description: Piglet is a self-hosted service for creating and managing digital flashcards and quizzes. It includes spaced repetition, deck management, and a study UI built for personal or educational use.

features.title: Flashcard Creation
features.description: Create digital flashcards with questions, answers, and optional images

features.title: Spaced Repetition
features.description: Automatically schedule card reviews using spaced repetition algorithms for optimal retention

features.title: Deck Management
features.description: Organize flashcards into decks by subject, topic, or difficulty level

features.title: Study Sessions
features.description: Practice with timed study sessions that adapt to your learning progress

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Monitor learning statistics including accuracy rates and review frequency

features.title: Quiz Mode
features.description: Test knowledge with quiz-style sessions that randomize card order

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate accounts for different learners with individual progress tracking

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Transfer flashcard decks using standard formats for sharing or backup
